meanings.definition: The state or quality of being fatty.
meanings.sent1: The fattinesses of the bacon made it extra delicious.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the fattinesses of the steak as I took a bite.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the fattinesses of the dish were what made it irresistible.
meanings.sent4: The fattinesses of the ice cream melted in my mouth like a creamy dream.
meanings.sent5: The fattinesses of the cheese left a rich and satisfying flavor on my palate.

meanings.definition: The amount of fat present in something.
meanings.sent1: The nutrition label showed the fattinesses of the snack were quite high.
meanings.sent2: I could see the fattinesses of the milk as the cream rose to the top.
meanings.sent3: The fattinesses of the cake were so evident that I knew it would be a decadent treat.
meanings.sent4: The fattinesses of the soup floated on the surface like little droplets of flavor.
meanings.sent5: The fattinesses of the avocado gave the salad a creamy texture that was delightful.
